class.name: Redirect
class.brief_description: Global class to provide signals for redirecting messages
class.description: This class provides a signal for hooking the output of print_* functions, for example to display a log display directly within the application, or to send it to an external log server (for example Sentry)

signal.name: print_line
signal.description: This signal gets called whenever a print function (print, print_debug, ...) is getting called. It provides the message and the flag incase it is an error as parameters to this function.
